nodes.text: The PW-8 Plasma Sniper Rifle was a model of plasma sniper rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The PW-8 Plasma Sniper Rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Wild Space Explorer's Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on September 1, 2015.
